10 class ActionClient():
11 
12  def __init__(self, action_name):
13  self.action_name = action_name
14  self.client = actionlib.SimpleActionClient(self.action_name, uarm_msgs.msg.uarm_moveAction)
15  self.lis = rospy.Subscriber(str(self.action_name+'/status'), GoalStatusArray, self.callback)
16  self.status = 0
17 
18  def callback(self, data):
19  try:
20  self.status = data.status_list[0].status
21  except:
22  self.status = 0

25  raw_input()
26  a_list.append(True)

28  def process(self):
29  a_list = []
30  thread.start_new_thread(self.input_thread, (a_list,))
31  while self.status == 1 and not a_list:
32  pass
33 
34  if a_list:
35  return True
36  else:
37  return False
38 
39  def move(self, x, y, z):
40  try:
41  print("connecting")
42  # Waits until the action server has started up and started
43  # listening for goals.
44  self.client.wait_for_server()
45  print("connected")
46  # Creates a goal to send to the action server.
47  goal = uarm_msgs.msg.uarm_moveGoal(x=x,y=y,z=z)
48  print("goal defined")
49  # Sends the goal to the action server.
50  self.client.send_goal(goal)
51  print("goal sent")
52  # Waits for the server to finish performing the action.
53  time.sleep(.1)
54 
55  #print("Press ENTER to interrupt")
56  #interrupted = self.process()
57  interrupted = False
58  if interrupted:
59  self.client.cancel_all_goals()
60  print("goal cancelled")
61  return False
62 
63  self.client.wait_for_result()
64  print("result received")
65  # Prints out the result of executing the action
66  return self.client.get_result()
67  except:
68  return False
